hero.title: Shop from Turkey, Delivered to Morocco — Fast, Simple, No Surprises
hero.description: Your complete Turkey-to-Morocco shipping solution — buy from Turkish stores, consolidate packages to save up to 80%, and get fast home delivery with customs handled.
hero.testimonial: Thanks to Shipit, I ordered authentic Turkish products at great prices. Consolidation saved me a lot, and delivery was quick with no customs issues. Highly recommend!

carouselTestimonial1.quote: Shipit made shopping from Turkey easier than I imagined. Fast shipping and excellent support.
carouselTestimonial1.author: Ahmed M.

carouselTestimonial2.quote: My Turkish orders arrived faster than expected. Professional team and great service.
carouselTestimonial2.author: Sara K.

carouselTestimonial3.quote: Consolidation cut my shipping cost almost in half. Great experience.
carouselTestimonial3.author: Youssef B.

carouselTestimonial4.quote: Customer support guided me through every step until my package from Turkey arrived.
carouselTestimonial4.author: Layla R.

carouselTestimonial5.quote: I trust Shipit for all my Turkish shopping. Reliable and fast.
carouselTestimonial5.author: Karim T.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Shop from any Turkish store and receive your package in Morocco easily

step1.title: Create Your Account
step1.description: Join Shipit in just a few clicks and instantly receive your personalized shipping address in Turkey. No hidden fees, 100% free registration.

step2.title: Shop from Turkey
step2.description: Order from Trendyol, Hepsiburada and all your favorite Turkish sites. We receive your packages and store them securely until shipping.

step3.title: Receive in Morocco
step3.description: We consolidate your packages to save up to 80% on shipping costs. Fast delivery to your door with customs clearance included.

ourServices.title: You Buy from Turkey, We Deliver to Morocco
ourServices.subtitle: A shipping process from Turkey to Morocco that is simple, transparent, and efficient.

step1.title: Create Your Account & Get a Free Turkish Address
step1.description: Join Shipit and instantly get your own shipping address in Turkey to buy any product.

step2.title: Shop from Turkey, Leave the Rest to Us
step2.description: Order from stores like Trendyol, Hepsiburada, and others, and we'll receive your packages for you.

step3.title: Customize Your Shipment
step3.description: Choose to consolidate packages or add extra protection before final shipping.

step4.title: Fast Delivery to Morocco
step4.description: We ensure your package arrives quickly and safely from Turkey to your home in Morocco.

step5.title: Enjoy Your Turkish Purchases
step5.description: Your package has arrived — time to enjoy it!
